attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The father of a Chinese man who died of bird flu has also been infected and may have caught it directly from his son, draws attention to the dangers of cross - transmission and lack of medical understanding of many infetious diseases. In view of today's AOL reports that,

" The World Health Organisation said it could not rule out the possibility of human-to-human infection of the deadly H5N1 strain of the virus", the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to 
examine the host, mode of sporadic transmission of this hard-to-treat flu strain and treatment, urging the P.M. to commission the production of a health information leaflet to raise awareness, in order to offset fears about the pandemic predicted by the WHO, which could potentially kill millions.
